tag_list: self-confident, competitive, goal-seeker, critical-thinking, achiever, planner, solver, organizer
overview:
Jorge Laranjo is a SAP International Consultant that is described by his peers as being Self-confident, Competitive, Goal-Seeker, Achiever, Planner, Solver and with loads of critical thinking.

He started as a webdeveloper back in the 2000’s and moved to SAP consulting in 2008.

He toke part in projects for clients such as Carrefour, AB-InBev, Telefonica, Linea Directa, Repsol YPF, Groupama, Zurich Financial Services and AXA Group Solutions.

In 2009 he relocated to Germany and joined ConVista Consulting. Still in 2009 he relocated to Spain where he toke part in SAP Treasury projects, until 2011. In 2011 he joined Chartis Insurance - an AIG company - in London as SAP FS-CD Functional Lead consultant.

He already had exposure to the following SAP modules: SAP FS-CD, SAP TRM, SAP SD, SAP MM, SAP PM, SAP CS and ABAP.

He also developed a custom solution, using Excel VBA, to support the SAP Market Risk Analyzer, using Bloomberg as the market data provider.

He has already lived in five different countries in Europe and 11 different cities. Jorge speaks Portuguese (native), English and Spanish and a little bit of French.

milestones.description: Joined Chartis Insurance as SAP FS-CD Lead
